items.name: Cooling Guide: what actually lowers temps (read)
items.description: Biggest levers: airflow/dust, fan curves, undervolt/power limits, repaste, ambient temps. Falcon presets below change OS-side cooling behavior.

steps.command:
Write-Output "=== FALCON COOLING GUIDE (PRACTICAL) ==="
Write-Output ""
Write-Output "Highest-impact cooling wins:"
Write-Output "  1) Dust cleanup + airflow (intake + exhaust) + correct fan direction."
Write-Output "  2) Fan curve: spin up earlier, map fans to correct sensors."
Write-Output "  3) CPU undervolt / power limit (biggest heat reduction per FPS lost)."
Write-Output "  4) GPU undervolt / power limit."
Write-Output "  5) Re-paste / cooler mounting / thermal pads."
Write-Output "  6) Lower ambient temperature."
Write-Output ""
Write-Output "Windows note:"
Write-Output "  Windows typically cannot directly control motherboard/laptop fans."
Write-Output "  For real fan curves, use FanControl (desktops) or an OEM laptop fan tool."
Write-Output ""
Write-Output "=== END ==="

items.name: Apply: Cooling Preset: Silent / Low Noise
items.description: Active cooling + slightly reduced CPU max state to reduce heat/noise spikes.

steps.command:
Write-Output "Applying SILENT cooling preset..."
powercfg -setacvalueindex SCHEME_CURRENT SUB_PROCESSOR 94D3A615-A899-4AC5-AE2B-E4D8F634367F 0 | Out-Null
powercfg -setdcvalueindex SCHEME_CURRENT SUB_PROCESSOR 94D3A615-A899-4AC5-AE2B-E4D8F634367F 0 | Out-Null
powercfg -setacvalueindex SCHEME_CURRENT SUB_PROCESSOR PROCTHROTTLEMAX 97 | Out-Null
powercfg -setdcvalueindex SCHEME_CURRENT SUB_PROCESSOR PROCTHROTTLEMAX 95 | Out-Null
powercfg -setacvalueindex SCHEME_CURRENT SUB_PROCESSOR PROCTHROTTLEMIN 5 | Out-Null
powercfg -setdcvalueindex SCHEME_CURRENT SUB_PROCESSOR PROCTHROTTLEMIN 5 | Out-Null
powercfg -SetActive SCHEME_CURRENT | Out-Null
Write-Output "Done."

Write-Output "Reverting SILENT preset..."
powercfg -setacvalueindex SCHEME_CURRENT SUB_PROCESSOR PROCTHROTTLEMAX 100 | Out-Null
powercfg -setdcvalueindex SCHEME_CURRENT SUB_PROCESSOR PROCTHROTTLEMAX 100 | Out-Null
powercfg -SetActive SCHEME_CURRENT | Out-Null
Write-Output "Done."

items.description: Active cooling + slightly reduced CPU max state to reduce heat/noise spikes.
items.name: Revert: Cooling Preset: Silent / Low Noise

steps.command:
Write-Output "Reverting SILENT preset..."
powercfg -setacvalueindex SCHEME_CURRENT SUB_PROCESSOR PROCTHROTTLEMAX 100 | Out-Null
powercfg -setdcvalueindex SCHEME_CURRENT SUB_PROCESSOR PROCTHROTTLEMAX 100 | Out-Null
powercfg -SetActive SCHEME_CURRENT | Out-Null
Write-Output "Done."

Write-Output "Applying BALANCED cooling preset..."
powercfg -setacvalueindex SCHEME_CURRENT SUB_PROCESSOR 94D3A615-A899-4AC5-AE2B-E4D8F634367F 0 | Out-Null
powercfg -setdcvalueindex SCHEME_CURRENT SUB_PROCESSOR 94D3A615-A899-4AC5-AE2B-E4D8F634367F 0 | Out-Null
powercfg -setacvalueindex SCHEME_CURRENT SUB_PROCESSOR PROCTHROTTLEMAX 100 | Out-Null
powercfg -setdcvalueindex SCHEME_CURRENT SUB_PROCESSOR PROCTHROTTLEMAX 100 | Out-Null
powercfg -setacvalueindex SCHEME_CURRENT SUB_PROCESSOR PROCTHROTTLEMIN 5 | Out-Null
powercfg -setdcvalueindex SCHEME_CURRENT SUB_PROCESSOR PROCTHROTTLEMIN 5 | Out-Null
powercfg -SetActive SCHEME_CURRENT | Out-Null
Write-Output "Done."
Write-Output 'Balanced preset uses common defaults; no revert needed.'
Write-Output 'Balanced preset uses common defaults; no revert needed.'

items.name: Apply: Cooling Preset: Performance / Cold & Fast
items.description: Active cooling + aggressive AC minimum processor state (higher idle temps, best frametime stability).

steps.command:
Write-Output "Applying PERFORMANCE cooling preset..."
powercfg -setacvalueindex SCHEME_CURRENT SUB_PROCESSOR 94D3A615-A899-4AC5-AE2B-E4D8F634367F 0 | Out-Null
powercfg -setdcvalueindex SCHEME_CURRENT SUB_PROCESSOR 94D3A615-A899-4AC5-AE2B-E4D8F634367F 0 | Out-Null
powercfg -setacvalueindex SCHEME_CURRENT SUB_PROCESSOR PROCTHROTTLEMIN 100 | Out-Null
powercfg -setacvalueindex SCHEME_CURRENT SUB_PROCESSOR PROCTHROTTLEMAX 100 | Out-Null
powercfg -SetActive SCHEME_CURRENT | Out-Null
Write-Output "Done."

Write-Output "Reverting PERFORMANCE preset..."
powercfg -setacvalueindex SCHEME_CURRENT SUB_PROCESSOR PROCTHROTTLEMIN 5 | Out-Null
powercfg -setacvalueindex SCHEME_CURRENT SUB_PROCESSOR PROCTHROTTLEMAX 100 | Out-Null
powercfg -SetActive SCHEME_CURRENT | Out-Null
Write-Output "Done."
